reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's style, particularly its slightly cropped stripes that can be dressed up or down, and appreciate its fit, with one noting it drapes nicely without being too baggy. Moreover, the softness, comfort, and quality receive positive feedback, with customers finding it not itchy and well-made. Additionally, they praise its warmth, noting it's perfect for both fall and winter, and like its size, w

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fall Sweater!
items.body: I am absolutely in love with this EVALESS Striped Sweater! It's everything I was hoping for and more. The material is soft and cozy, yet breathable, making it perfect for the cooler fall weather. I got the boat neck style, and it’s super flattering—gives a relaxed but chic vibe. The batwing sleeves are a unique touch and add a fun, oversized feel to the sweater, which I adore. I’m usually between a medium and large, so I ordered the large for an oversized look, and it fits perfectly. It drapes nicely without being too baggy, and the stripes are bold but not overwhelming. I’ve worn it with jeans and leggings, and it’s a great outfit completer! The quality is impressive for the price, and it holds up well after washing—no shrinking or pilling. I’ve received so many compliments already, and I feel stylish yet comfortable. Highly recommend this sweater to anyone looking for a cozy, trendy, and versatile piece for their fall wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Juja

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and comfortable!
items.body: I really like this sweater—it’s soft, lightweight, and perfect for fall. The boat neck and relaxed fit make it super comfortable, and the stripes give it a cute casual look. Easy to pair with jeans or shorts. The sleeves are a bit longer than I expected, but I actually like the cozy feel. Great buy for the price! Read more
items.author: Akshay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, unique and nice sweater
items.body: Look exactly like the picture. It’s a shorts / waist level sweater. The bottom band isn’t tight, but it more fitted with the mid section being loose and relaxed. Soft, but you can feel the texture of the ribbed design. Can be dressed up or down. It’s has a medium heavy feel. Not a true winter sweater, but heavier than a basic long sleeve shirt. Overall a nice quality shirt. Read more
items.author: Raymond Palmer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars beautiful sweater
items.body: I usually wear a large in tops. Ordered an XL hoping for an oversized fit and while it is a bit bigger than my normal size it is not as oversized as I had hoped for. Definitely go up 2 or maybe more if you are going for the off the shoulder look as shown in the listing. With that said, the material is great and I'm definitely keeping it. It seems to be a great quality. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made
items.body: Thick material and very quality made. It is not see thru and the holes in the knitting are not too big like they can be in some sweaters. It's more of a heavy top, for colder weather. I usually wear size small and this sweater in small fit me well with lots of extra room, to make it loose- fitting just like on the pictures. This makes it very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Tanya

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Had a hole after one wear
items.body: The sweater is very flattering and cute but unfortunately after one wear the sweater snagged and I won't be able to wear again. Read more
items.author: Jackie Nilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: This sweater is adorable! The material is thick and good quality, so it will be perfect when the weather cools down. It’s got an oversized look and feel, so it’s very flattering while still true to size. It didn’t peel up after washing and the colors remained beautiful and vibrant! Read more
items.author: Jamie R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and Warm
items.body: Absolutely love this winter long sleeve sweater! The fabric is soft, cozy, and warm without feeling bulky, making it perfect for layering. The fit is flattering yet relaxed. It’s versatile enough to pair with jeans for a casual look or dress it up with boots and accessories. Read more
items.author: Shreyans Sheth

short_description:
Womens Dress Boat Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress Boat Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Ashleigh Blue, Medium Grey, Blackish Green, Guacamole Green, Black, Light French Beige, Red Dahlia, Pale Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
